articles.description: A woman who featured in an episode which showed her and her 15-month old baby daughter being evicted from their flat in Hammersmith in 2015 has launched the claim at the High Court in London.
articles.content:
A mother who was filmed being evicted as part of the hit show 'Can't Pay? We'll Take it Away' has launched a High Court privacy battle against Channel 5.
The woman is suing the broadcaster for up to… [+4097 chars]
